name: Last Colony (Scrim TV)
description:
Run your colony after the collapse of society

Recruit colonists, craft weapons and supplies and venture out from your colony base to gather resources. Life is rough in the new world with hardcore shooter gameplay to match

Craft guns, bombs, meds and armor. Upgrade your guns with 50+ possible combinations. Chose an ability that matches your play style. Level up to unlock more crafting recipes

Have feedback or suggestions? Join our Discord to let us know https://discord.gg/7KErYbQdQM

Requires a device with at least 1.5GB of RAM
